Food crisis around the world

There are places in the world where history seems to be running backwards: children are stopping going to school. The reason, so they can work in the fields because it&#039;s the only way their family can get enough to eat.

Meanwhile, in the UK we&#039;re putting agricultural products in our petrol tanks to help fight global warming. A painstaking international survey has warned there is a looming catastrophe unless farming is radically reformed.

Jeremy Paxman reports on the food crisis around the world.

Shunster
